name: A Day In A Life Of A Seagull
name_original: A Day In A Life Of A Seagull
description:
You get to experience what it is kind of like to be a seagull for a day. This game is based a bit on reality, but mostly the game is fictional and the events in the game doesn't occur in real life.

The game is inspired by this Reddit post about a bagel being stolen by a seagull. ;-)

Also, don't play this game while eating or having a beverage!
